name: Hale Kokua program; established
text: There is established, within the authority, a homeless assistance program known as the Hale Kokua program, to provide incentives and assistance to private homeowners throughout the State who set aside existing dwelling units, or construct or renovate dwelling units, for rental for a period of five years by families or individuals classified as employed but homeless.  The authority shall administer the Hale Kokua program and adopt the standards and framework necessary to implement the program. [L 2006, c 180, pt of §2]
